cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the selection of referees for the evaluation of research proposals, which is a common practice in computer science research. The paper also mentions the evaluation of scientific performance, which suggests a focus on the quality of research. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper mentions the importance of expertise in the core topic, which suggests a focus on specific areas of computer science, such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SE (Software Engineering).
